keywords: coffee, overnight oats, recipe, breakfast, dalgona coffee
name: Brown Sugar Espresso Overnight Oats

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the overnight oats ingredients together in a bowl or jar, then cover and place in the fridge overnight or for at least 4 hours. Add rolled oats, chia seeds, salt, espresso, oat milk, brown sugar, vanilla, and vanilla greek yogurt.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: In the morning, whisk the granulated sugar, instant coffee, and boiling water together until it forms soft peaks. Add granulated sugar, instant coffee, and boiling water.
